title: The Long Kiss Goodnight
description: Samantha leads a life that is unrecognizable to her. Then in a moment, her past comes back to her with a vengeance as she slowly begins to realize what her former life was all about. Samantha was a top killer and now she has to bring back her skills to save her daughter from the men who want both of them dead. This TV-tie accompanies the New Line Cinema movie release starring Geena Davis.
author: Shane Black
